titles.title: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act
To adjust the boundary of the Carson National Forest, New Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 11/3/2011--Introduced. Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act - Adjusts the boundary of the Carson National Forest in New Mexico to incorporate approximately 4,990 acres of land identified as the Miranda Canyon Boundary on the map entitled "Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment" and dated September 21, 2010.
